mapper.update: update role set userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginTime = #{loginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, establishTime = #{establishTime,jdbcType=DATE}, roleName = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, userName, name, tel, loginTime, establishTime, roleName from role
